column4: When I start ubuntu and I CTRL+ALT+F1, while its loading everything is OK except the avahi daemon
When ubunut is starting up/loading... i CTRL+ALT+F1 and everything loads OK except the avahi daemon.. any ideas?
what sort of error is it giving, exactly?
It just shows failed in red
mkay, if you open a root terminal and then do a /etc/init.d/avahi-daemon restart  (or something similar) do you get any more information?
even the terminal is SO slow for some reason
try this command in the terminal: top   it should tell you what process(es) are chewing things up
should be fine then, might need to tweak it to use different bootup arguments tho
did you get the root prompt?
yeah, no swearing in here, 'tis a family channel
alright.. so what have I got as basic apps in ubuntu? :)
click on 'applications' and it should lay it all out :)
